spec_data.Name: allegro5-addon-audio
spec_data.Description:
This package provides the audio addon for the Allegro 5 library. This
addon allows you to play sounds in your Allegro 5 programs.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 03:20:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Audio addon for the Allegro 5 library
